title: History and Features of Java
description: Learn about the challenges before Java, how it was created, and the core features that made it revolutionary.

You're a software developer in the early '90s. Computers are starting to pop up everywhere. There's Windows, Mac, IBM, Sun Microsystems machines â€” but every machine speaks a different language! **Developers needed a way to write one program and run it everywhere.**

Building apps was painful â€” you had to **rewrite programs** for every different computer system. C and C++ couldn't solve the portability problem.

In 1991, **James Gosling** and the Green Project team at Sun Microsystems created Java to be small, portable, and robust. Officially launched in 1995, Java promised "**Write Once, Run Anywhere.**"
